entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kluane Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burwash Airport 08:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
